content: This is fantastic! Dark mode was really needed. The implementation looks great and works seamlessly across all browsers. Really appreciate the attention to accessibility standards.
Thanks for all the positive feedback! We're thrilled that the dark mode feature is working well for everyone. We put a lot of effort into maintaining readability and accessibility standards.
Real-time collaboration is exactly what our team needed! Can't wait to see this implemented. Will it support version history as well?
Yes! Version history will be included in the real-time collaboration feature. We're currently working on the conflict resolution system and expect to have this ready for beta testing next month.
This will be a game changer for remote teams. The live cursors feature mentioned sounds really innovative!
Advanced search is crucial for large projects. The saved queries feature would be incredibly useful for recurring searches.
Mobile performance has been a pain point for our field team. Great to see this is being prioritized!
We've made significant improvements to mobile performance and are currently testing in our staging environment. Initial results show 60% faster load times!
Slack integration would streamline our workflow so much. We're constantly switching between tools right now.
We're evaluating the technical requirements for Slack integration. It's definitely on our roadmap and we're excited about the possibilities!
Custom dashboards would be amazing! Being able to see exactly what I need at a glance would save so much time.
Time tracking improvements are desperately needed. The automatic idle detection feature sounds perfect!
Automated backups are essential for enterprise customers. This should definitely be a high priority feature.
Two-factor authentication is a must-have for security compliance. Looking forward to the hardware token support!
Workflow automation could revolutionize how we handle repetitive tasks. The visual builder approach sounds user-friendly!
